content:
Hey guys, been deploying Zulip into a prod environment and running into a weird error: Getting a File "/usr/lib/python3.8/socket.py", line 796, in create_connection
sock.connect(sa)
socket.timeout: timed out

Error, but only when it's sending invite link emails or when someone clicks to respond to an invite link. It does not happen when I use the email test tool, that works successfully!
I should add that I'm behing a nginx reverse proxy, and communicating with the zulip container via docker networking
@Rod Slav usually that's going to be caused by a firewall preventing your Zulip server from connecting to your outgoing email server.
